jsonformatter.title: JSON Formatter
jsonformatter.description: Format, validate, and visualize your JSON data in a readable format.
jsonformatter.usage: Paste your minified or unformatted JSON in the text area below, then click 'Format JSON' to convert it into a properly indented, readable format.

jsonschemagenerator.title: JSON Schema Generator
jsonschemagenerator.description: Generate JSON Schema from JSON data automatically.
jsonschemagenerator.usage: Paste your JSON in the input area, configure the options, and click 'Generate Schema' to create a JSON Schema that describes your data structure.

uuidgenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidgenerator.description: Generate random UUIDs quickly and copy them to clipboard.
uuidgenerator.usage: Click the "Generate UUID" button to create a new UUID. Use the "Copy" button to copy it to your clipboard.

base64.title: Base64 Encoder / Decoder
base64.description: Encode or decode Base64 strings on the fly.
base64.usage: Select "Encode" to convert normal text to Base64, or "Decode" to convert Base64 back to normal text. Enter your input text and click "Convert". Use the "Copy" button to copy the result.

jwtdecoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwtdecoder.description: Decode and inspect the contents of a JWT token.
jwtdecoder.usage: Paste your JWT token in the text area below and click 'Decode' to view the decoded information.
jwtdecoder.subject: Subject

timestampconverter.title: Timestamp Converter
timestampconverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and readable date formats.
timestampconverter.usage: Enter a Unix timestamp and click "To Date" to convert it to a readable date, or enter a date and click "To Timestamp" to get the Unix timestamp. Use the "Now" button to get the current timestamp and date.

caseconverter.title: Case Converter
caseconverter.description: Convert text to UPPER, lower, Title, camelCase, or snake_case.
caseconverter.usage: Enter your text in the input field, then click one of the case conversion buttons below to transform it to your desired format.

loremipsum.title: Lorem Ipsum Generator
loremipsum.description: Generate placeholder paragraphs of lorem ipsum text.
loremipsum.usage: Select the number of paragraphs you want to generate (1-20), then click "Generate" to create the placeholder text.

regextester.title: Regex Tester
regextester.description: Test regular expressions against any input string.
regextester.usage: Enter your regex pattern in the first field, add the text you want to test in the textarea, then click 'Test' to see all matches.

markdowntohtml.title: Markdown to HTML
markdowntohtml.description: Convert Markdown text to clean, readable HTML.
markdowntohtml.usage: Enter or paste your Markdown text in the input area, then click 'Convert to HTML' to see the HTML output and preview.

htmlcssminifier.title: HTML/CSS Minifier
htmlcssminifier.description: Minify your HTML and CSS code quickly and efficiently.
htmlcssminifier.usage: Paste your HTML or CSS code in the editor below. The tool will automatically minify it. You can copy the minified code using the copy button.

colorconverter.title: Color Converter
colorconverter.description: Convert between HEX, RGB, and HSL color formats easily.
colorconverter.usage: Enter a color in any format and see its equivalent in other formats. Click on any value to copy it to clipboard.

wordcounter.title: Word Counter
wordcounter.description: Count words, characters, sentences, and get detailed text statistics.
wordcounter.usage: Paste or type your text in the box below to see real-time statistics about your content.
wordcounter.placeholder: Type or paste your text here...

urlencoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
urlencoder.description: Encode or decode URL components to make them valid for web addresses.
urlencoder.usage: Enter a string to encode or decode. URL encoding converts special characters to a format that can be transmitted over the Internet.
urlencoder.encodingdetails:
URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in URLs into a format that can be transmitted over the Internet.
 It replaces unsafe ASCII characters with a "%" followed by two hexadecimal digits.

hashgenerator.title: Hash Generator
hashgenerator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, SHA-3, and RIPEMD-160 hashes from any text.
hashgenerator.usage: Enter text, select hash algorithms, and click 'Generate Hashes' to create hash values.
hashgenerator.hashfunctions: Hash functions convert data of arbitrary size to a fixed-size string. They are designed to be:
hashgenerator.hashwarning: MD5 and SHA-1 are considered cryptographically broken and should not be used for security purposes.

qrcodegenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrcodegenerator.description: Generate customizable QR codes for URLs, text, contact information, and more.
qrcodegenerator.usage: Select the type of content, enter the required information, customize your QR code appearance, then download or copy the generated QR code.

diffchecker.title: Diff Checker
diffchecker.description: Compare two texts and highlight the differences between them.
diffchecker.usage: Enter or paste text in both panels, then view the differences highlighted below.
diffchecker.entertoview: Enter text in both panels to see the differences
diffchecker.originalplaceholder: Enter or paste original text here...
diffchecker.modifiedplaceholder: Enter or paste modified text here...

apitester.title: API Tester
apitester.description: Test API endpoints with different HTTP methods, headers, and request bodies.
apitester.usage: Enter a URL, select a method and call that endpoint. View the response from server. Be aware of CORS.
apitester.corswarning: CORS Notice: Browser security prevents cross-origin requests unless the API explicitly allows it.
apitester.corslimitedaccess: Note: In no-cors mode, you cannot access the response content, but the request will be sent.

corsworkarounds.title: If you encounter CORS errors, try:
corsworkarounds.samedomain: Testing with APIs on the same domain

tools.title: Tools
tools.adjustsearch: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria

about.title: About Devtoolbox
about.description: A collection of free, fast, and useful developer tools built with React and TypeScript.
about.purpose: Devtoolbox was created to provide developers with a set of useful tools that are fast, free, and work entirely in the browser. No data is sent to any server - all processing happens locally in your browser.
about.feedbacktext: We welcome your feedback and contributions! Please feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request on our GitHub repository.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact.error: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website.
privacy.datacollectiontext: We do not collect any personal data. All tools on this website process data entirely in your browser. Your data never leaves your device and is not sent to any server.
privacy.analyticstext: We use basic analytics to understand how our website is used. This data is anonymous and does not identify you personally.
privacy.cookiestext: We use cookies to remember your preferences, such as language and dark mode settings. These cookies are stored locally on your device and are not used for tracking.
privacy.changestext: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
